name: create_task_plan
description: Create a structured task plan for executing a request

overall_strategy.description: High-level strategy for completing the request

title.description: Short descriptive title for the task

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be done

items.description: Index of task that must complete before this task can start

dependencies.description: Array of task indices this task depends on. Empty array means task can run immediately. Use this to enable parallel execution of independent tasks.

tasks.description: List of tasks to complete the request. Tasks with no dependencies can run in parallel.
